_EFI_SECURITY_ARCH_PROTOCOL Struct Reference


Data Fields

EFI_SECURITY_FILE_AUTHENTICATION_STATE FileAuthenticationState

Detailed Description

The EFI_SECURITY_ARCH_PROTOCOL is used to abstract platform-specific policy from the DXE core. This includes locking flash upon failure to authenticate, attestation logging, and other exception operations.

EFI_SECURITY_FILE_AUTHENTICATION_STATE _EFI_SECURITY_ARCH_PROTOCOL::FileAuthenticationState
